author: remm
msg: - Set the token field of the Uri object.

author: remm
msg: - It is now possible to set additional parameters in the SlideToken, like additional

author: remm
msg: - Add a new getUri(SlideToken, String) method in addition to getUri(String),
which will set the specified SlideToken in the Uri object.

author: remm
msg: - The Uri will now be able to hold a reference to the SlideToken which was given
by the client. This can be used by a store to keep track of user access, do
additional access control, or more effectively control resources.
- It is allowed that this field is not set. That means that the access to the store
is made directly by Slide for additional internal operations (the internal ACL
checks are one example of this).

author: remm
msg: - Add a simple implementation of DASL's SEARCH method, contributed by
